availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Ann Eliza Stewart. Father of Pendleton Stewart Morris. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 44. The Louisiana Society of the Sons of the American Revolution, Pendleton Stewart Morris Application for Membership, National Number 21273, State Number 137, 9 April 1914, *Sons of the American Revolution Membership Applications, 1889-1970", Louisville, Kentucky: National Society of the Sons of the American Revolution. Microfilm, 508 rolls. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Peaks Mill District, p. 9.
